lead_paragraph: Tarik Glenn, a three-time Pro Bowl tackle for the Indianapolis Colts, announced yesterday that he would retire from the N.F.L. because he no longer had the passion he once had for football. Glenn, 31, was a main reason quarterback Peyton Manning was sacked only 15 times last season and a league-low 176 times since Manning joined the team in 1998.
